encyclopedia.content: 基本信息： 成立地点：美国加利福利亚州洛杉矶市 流派：重金属/硬摇滚/流行金属 活跃年份：1984–1989，1998，2008，2010 厂牌：Shrapnel，Gold Mountain/A&M，Gold Castle，MCA 相关乐队：Black Sabbath，Steeler，Badlands，King Kobra，W.A.S.P，.Pantera，Cold Sweat，Medicine Wheel，Iron Horse乐队历史： Keel由Steeler（就是Yngwie Malmsteen的那个乐队）的主唱Ron Keel组建，乐队直接用这位主唱的姓氏命名，Ron Keel

entry.def: The keel of a boat is the long, specially shaped piece of wood or steel along the bottom of it.
If you say that someone or something is on an even keel, you mean that they are working or progressing smoothly and steadily, without any sudden changes.

example.ex: Jason had helped him out with a series of loans, until he could get back on an even keel.
example.tran: 贾森接连借了几笔钱给他，在他重新走上正轨之前帮他渡过了难关。

means.word_mean: 1. the median ridge on the breastbone of birds that fly
2. one of the main longitudinal beams (or plates) of the hull of a vessel; can extend vertically into the water to provide lateral stability
1. walk as if unable to control one's movements;
